titleStmt.title: An enquiry after truth and righteousness, and after the people whom the Lord establisheth and will establish therein in some queries on Isa. 58, and also on chapter 54.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Isaac, 1616-1679.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: "Written in Reading-Goal ... the latter end of the 4th moneth 1671. Isaac Penington."
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
